Dr. Ian Binns

Dr. Ian Binns

1189.53.text:

To say that, okay well, this particular finding

1358.61.text:

what is the implication there? You know, what

Wills H. Citty

You know, I would love to say yes but I don’t

biology teachers to have an evolution biology
course in their preparation. When talking

1524.69.text:
about secondary level and also the middle
school level. But I also felt like too, you

1528.43.text:
know, we need to get them good science teachers

1532.83.text:
to make sure they have a better understanding

1537.10.text:
scientific work, or scientific inquiry. Having

them to the point where you’re not allowed

better when it comes to you know, I think

Wills H. Citty
What’s the way forward in this debate at

large? And I know that’s probably difficult

1773.45.text:
Throughout history, at times I think it was

1778.59.text:
other times where they we’re the ones who
